Header.title: If we're open,
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

About.paragraph: It started with a dream, and it took a while, but it happened! A programmer/ musician and a pharmacist have finally found their happy place and it is in Surf City, NC. Three wonderful kids, four dogs, two cats, and a cyclone of family and friends have been our moral support to get us to our place here in the sun. Thirty-nine years of marriage has made us strong and determined to spend the rest of our love and lives doing what we love to do, and that is to provide beer, wine, and entertainment. Hopefully you can find time during your busy vacation to visit us at The Second Row! P.S. There are 2 resident pups, and their names are Lilly and K.C.

Features.title: Beer, Wine, and Snacks
Features.text: Bottles, cans, and beer on tap as well cold white wine, red wine, flights, growlers for carry out and kegs for order. Snacks available and outside food welcome!

Features.title: Live Music
Features.text: Open Mic/Open Jam all day every day, except during live performances. Check our facebook page for upcoming events!

Features.title: Outdoor Seating
Features.text: Enjoy relaxing bistro seating on the front porch, or bring the whole crew to our large deck and sit in our comfortable dog friendly seating area! (leash only)

Features.title: Event Hosting
Features.text: Call ahead for your birthday party, graduation or team event and we can accomodate for large reservations! Bring the whole family and enjoy.

Features.title: Guitar Shop
Features.text: We have guitar picks, capos, straps, and a variety of strings. Refurbished guitars available with constantly cycling inventory. Inquire with Bernie for lessons!

Features.title: Gifts and more
Features.text: We welcome ‘Idle Nomad Gift Shop’ to our unique little taproom! Audrey and Luke have a little something for everyone here.
